references.reason: This paper introduces diffusion-based representation learning, a core concept in the proposed D2R2 model which leverages the powerful expression ability of diffusion models.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational technique upon which the D2R2 model's diffusion-based representation learning is built.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper details score-based generative modeling using stochastic differential equations, providing the theoretical background for the D2R2 model's conditional diffusion process.

references.paper_title: STUNT: Few-shot tabular learning with self-generated tasks from unlabeled tables
references.reason: This paper directly addresses few-shot tabular learning, providing a benchmark and related work for the proposed D2R2 method in the context of few-shot tabular classification.
This paper explores unsupervised meta-learning, offering a relevant perspective to the problem of tabular few-shot learning where labeled data is limited, supporting the design choices in D2R2.
